content:
Sure! Here's the content for section 1-c) Product/service development content and process:

1-c) Product/service development content and process

* Student admission model: Develop a learning and employment suitability evaluation model that is the basis for competency evaluation.
	+ Admission model development will be based on machine learning and will utilize data gathered from applicants' resumes, coding tests, and behavioral data to assess their competency and suitability for our program.
	+ This will provide a streamlined admissions process for our company, while also allowing us to ensure that students are placed in a program that best suits their skillset and goals.
* Data accumulation by funnel: Collected qualitative cumulative experience data of students through the entire training funnel in bootcamp.
	+ We have accumulated an extensive amount of data over the years, and are constantly refining our process to ensure that we are gathering the most relevant and useful data.
	+ This data will be used to inform the development of our curriculum, as well as the competency evaluation model.
* B2B expansion and linkage: We have secured corporate data and conducted digital transformation training through B2B business.
	+ By expanding into the B2B market, we will be able to reach a wider audience and help more companies transform their workforce.
	+ We have already established relationships with several major corporations, and plan to continue building partnerships to ensure our continued success in this area.

Additionally, as we continue to develop our product and services, we will focus on creating a comprehensive, end-to-end solution for talent transformation. This will include everything from pre-training assessment to post-training job placement, and will be designed to provide our clients with a seamless and efficient experience.

We will also work to ensure that our training curriculum remains up-to-date and relevant to the needs of the industry, by utilizing the data gathered from our competency evaluation model and other sources.

Finally, we will continue to explore new technologies and techniques for delivering our training, such as online courses, immersive simulations, and other forms of experiential learning.

Table view content for 2-b-i) Status, pros and cons of other players in the market:

| Company | Classification | Core characteristics | Strengths | Innovative technologies | Limitations |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Coursera | Online education platform | Massive online courses | Global brand awareness | AI-powered adaptive learning | Limited interaction |
| edX | Online education platform | University partnerships | Strong brand identity | High-quality course content | Limited interactivity |
| Udemy | Online education platform | Instructor-led courses | Affordable pricing | Wide variety of course offerings | Inconsistent course quality |
| LinkedIn Learning | Career transformation platform | Learning content and job postings | Huge professional network | Personalized course recommendations | Limited focus on technical skills |
| General Assembly | Career transformation platform | Career training programs | Strong corporate partnerships | Highly interactive and hands-on | Limited variety of courses |
| Pluralsight | Online education platform | Technology skill development | Comprehensive curriculum | Skill assessments and analytics | Limited interactivity |
